ReactScanDemo.title: React Scan Performance Demo
ReactScanDemo.description: Interactive demonstration of React Scan performance monitoring capabilities

instructions.title: How to Use This Demo
instructions.step1: Press Ctrl+Shift+X to toggle React Scan on/off
instructions.step2: Click the buttons below to trigger different types of renders
instructions.step3: Watch for red highlights (unnecessary renders) and green highlights (optimized renders)
instructions.step4: Use the React Scan toolbar in the bottom-right corner for detailed analysis

about.pageDescription: Leading manufacturer of architectural glass and aluminum window/door systems for Australian and European markets. AS 2047 & AS 1288 certified.

hero.title: Precision Engineering for Modern Architecture
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for high-performance glass and aluminum facade solutions. Serving builders, contractors, and distributors across Australia and Europe.

overview.title: Our Legacy & Vision
overview.history: Founded in 2010, Tucsenberg Glass has grown from a regional manufacturer to a globally recognized supplier of premium architectural glass products. Our state-of-the-art facility combines German engineering precision with scalable production capacity to serve projects of any size.
overview.mission: We are committed to delivering superior facade solutions that enhance building performance, energy efficiency, and aesthetic appeal. Every product leaving our facility meets the stringent requirements of international building codes.

factory.title: Manufacturing Capabilities
factory.subtitle: Our 50,000 sqm facility is equipped with advanced automation to ensure precision, consistency, and scale for projects of any size.

tempering.title: Glass Tempering
tempering.description: Double-chamber convection furnaces with computerized temperature control for consistent safety glass production.

coating.title: Coating Lines
coating.description: Advanced Low-E and solar control coating application for enhanced thermal performance and energy efficiency.

cnc.title: CNC Processing
cnc.description: High-precision cutting, drilling, and edge processing with tolerances to 0.1mm for perfect fit every time.

certifications.title: Certified Quality
certifications.subtitle: Meeting rigorous international standards for safety, performance, and environmental responsibility.

global.title: Exporting Excellence Worldwide
global.description: We specialize in international logistics and compliance for architectural glass products. Our dedicated export team ensures your glass arrives safely, on schedule, and fully compliant with local building codes.

cta.finalSubtitle: Get a competitive quote for your next commercial or residential development. Our team responds within 24 hours.

products.pageDescription: Explore our comprehensive range of high-quality products for your business needs.
products.emptyState: No products available. Please check back later.

inquiry.title: Product Inquiry
inquiry.description: Interested in this product? Send us an inquiry for pricing and availability.
inquiry.requirementsPlaceholder: Please describe any special requirements such as customization, packaging, or certifications...
inquiry.success: Your inquiry has been sent successfully! We will get back to you within 24 hours.
inquiry.error: Failed to send inquiry. Please try again later.

trust.climateDescription: Our products are rigorously tested to withstand Australia's unique environmental conditions, from extreme heat to coastal storms.

cta.contactDescription: Contact our expert team to find the perfect glazing solutions for your next architectural project.
